directions.text: In a baking dish rub lamb with garlic, thyme, salt, pepper and 2 TBSP olive oil.
Process pistachios until a crust consistency, and spread out on a large plate.
Preheat oven to 400°, and heat a large skillet with medium high heat and 1 TBSP oil.
Brown both sides of the lamb for 5 mins each sides.
Rub meat with mustard and roll both sides in nuts.
Roast meat in oven for about 15 mins till lamb is 140°.
Let meat rest for 10 mins before cutting the individual chops.
